Name: Bomb!Bomb!Carnival!!
About the game: This game is a third-person sports bombing game where you compete with other players using various bombs. I want to explode more! For those of you who are interested You have received an invitation from a sports bombing festival. What is sports bombing? It is a sport in which you compete against other players using safe bombs. Key Features Online match Hot battles with sports bombers from around the world! Bomb Customization Customize the three shapes of bombs to your liking! Coloring Fashion is important. Feel free to change the color of your clothes! Leaderboard Who's the best sports bomber in the world! Demo The following limitations apply to the demo version. Single-player only Score limit 15 Your score and other saved data can be transferred to the full version.
